comments:
Creating a pop-up menu (org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Menu with style SWT.POP_UP) 
that has more than 23 nested cascading menus causing an SWT error on windows. 
I was unable to reproduce this problem on Linux. I will attach a sample plug-
in that includes a view that contains a button that displays the pop up menu 
which results in the following error message in the .log file:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: Cannot set menu

Created an attachment (id=12895)
Plug-in containing a view that causes the nested menu error

This is a plug-in that contains a view that causes the nested menu error. If
this view is displayed on a Windows XP system an SWT error will be written to
the .log file
CANTFIX ... it's a bug in Windows that we cannot work around.
